title: [LFP] Gold 5 Support looking for duo next season
body:
Hey all, I am looking for a consistent adc partner to climb the ranks with next season, my goal is to get into diamond, I have a coach and I also study as many videos and record all my own games so I can see all my own mistakes and correct my play, I am serious about my goal. I would love to have someone come on this journey with me, I will only be accepting serious people, if you want to troll or feed in the games then obviously thats not use to me you know ;)

I Live in Brisbane, Australia, I am 23 years old and work full time. I tend to be online from when I get home so about 5:30pm-9:30pm weeknights then have full playtime on the weekends. 

Players wishing to join me in reaching this goal, I'd like you to fill out the following:

IGN:
Age: 
Location: (timezone purposes)
Best ADCs:

Write a small about you phrase that will sum up your own goals
Voice comms: (skype, ts3, raidcall)

replies.body:
IGN: Eight Diagrams
Age: 20
Location: NSW
Best ADCs: Kog'Maw, Tristana, Corki.

My goal is to improve my skills. Last season I set my goal to rising to Gold from Bronze. I did this, and stopped as soon as I hit Gold V. In the upcoming season, I would like to see myself reach Platinum V, and continue to improve once I'm there.
Voice comms: Skype, Curse Voice.

IGN: KingDinger
Age: 25
Location: (timezone purposes) NSW
Best ADCs: Trist Sivir Lucian.

Write a small about you phrase that will sum up your own goals: wanna get atleast gold, currently silver 4. sick of people treating me like %%%% cos im silver. yet they are nice as pie to bronzies in GD....and hell, the bronzies treat me like %%%% just as much as the gold+. hell, even the silvers slightly higher (2 and 3) act like they are so much better than me.
ive been looking for a consistent duo partner all season, at the start of the season i had a good thing going with a support main, but he quit. so i transitioned to other lanes and barely made progress. would like to go back to maining only ADC and focus on my own mechanics again.
Voice comms: (skype, ts3, raidcall) skype and TS3, can get raidcal, CV is bugging out on me lately.

IGN: CyanPhoenix
Age: 18
Location: Melbourne
Best ADCs: Vayne, Trist, Jinx, Lucian, Kalista

looking for someone reliable to help me climb to plat, diamond and hopefully further :3

Voice comms: i have skype, ts3, curse, and can get any others you want/need.
